Sorry that i use english...

But i have little problem with this game.
Have you noticed that it uses very high
monitor refresh rates...so i can't use even
1024x768 resolution! 
In 800x600   h: 77.6 v: 122.
Other games on this resolution are: 77.6 and 60.x

Is there something wrong with my 5900xt drivers
or what? PLZ answer.

i found the medicine for refresh problem but
somebody may still break their monitor with
that shitty game...
Use dxdiag and click more help page.
In more help page check 'override'
and there you can enter the value
used in any game and any resolution.
75 is fine with me.

Be carefull with Incredibles...maybe faulty
crack caused this...don't know!?!!?
